channel.title: Supreme Valves - Industrial Valves Product Feed
channel.description: Official product feed for Supreme Valves India - Manufacturers of High Quality Industrial Valves.

item.title: Gate Valve
item.description: High-performance gate valves for reliable on-off control in industrial applications.

item.title: Globe Valve
item.description: Precision flow control valves for throttling and regulating applications.

item.title: Ball Valve
item.description: Quick-acting ball valves for tight shut-off and minimal pressure drop.

item.title: Ball Valve with Actuator
item.description: Automated ball valves with electric, pneumatic, or hydraulic actuators.

item.title: Check Valve
item.description: Automatic valves preventing reverse flow and backflow protection.

item.title: Butterfly Valve
item.description: Compact, lightweight valves for large diameter applications.

item.title: Sight Glass
item.description: Visual flow indicators for monitoring fluid flow and level.

item.title: Knife Edge Gate Valve
item.description: Designed for slurry and viscous media with cutting edge disc.

item.title: Swing Check Valve
item.description: Full-bore check valves with minimal pressure drop.

item.title: Piston Valve
item.description: High-pressure valves for precise flow control.

item.title: Blow Down Valve
item.description: Valves for draining and purging systems.

item.title: Basket / Pot Type Strainer
item.description: Large capacity strainers for removing debris from pipelines.

item.title: Single Piece Ball Valve
item.description: Compact, economical ball valves for general service.

item.title: Non Slam Check Valve
item.description: Silent check valves preventing water hammer.

item.title: Needle Valve
item.description: Precision valves for fine flow control and instrumentation.

item.title: Y-Type Strainer
item.description: Compact strainers for removing particles from fluid flow.

item.title: Two Piece Ball Valve
item.description: Serviceable ball valves for industrial applications.

item.title: Dual Plate Check Valve
item.description: Compact wafer-style check valves with low pressure drop.

item.title: Three Piece Ball Valve
item.description: Fully serviceable ball valves for critical applications.

item.title: Moisture Separator
item.description: Removes moisture and condensate from steam and gas lines.

item.title: Wafer Check Valve
item.description: Lightweight check valves for installation between flanges.

item.title: Pressure Reducing Valve
item.description: Automatic valves maintaining downstream pressure.

item.title: Lift Type Non Return Valve
item.description: Vertical flow check valves for high-pressure applications.

item.title: Flush Bottom Valve
item.description: Tank bottom valves for complete drainage.

item.title: Steam Trap - Thermodynamic
item.description: Compact steam traps for condensate removal.

item.title: Three Way / L Port / T Port Ball Valve
item.description: Multi-port valves for flow diversion and mixing.

item.title: Angle Type / Spring Loaded Safety Relief Valve
item.description: Pressure relief valves for overpressure protection.

item.title: 2-3 Way Motorized, Cylinder & Pneumatic Control Valve
item.description: Automated control valves for process automation.

item.title: SS 904L Butterfly Valve with Pneumatic Actuator
item.description: SS 904L Center Disc Double Flanged Butterfly Valve with Pneumatic Single Acting Actuator, EPDM Seat, EN 10204 3.1 Certified.

item.title: 10" Triple Offset Butterfly Valve ASME B16.5 Class 150
item.description: Triple Offset Butterfly Valve, Wafer Type, ASME B16.5 Class 150. WCB Body with 13CR Seat and Graphite Seals.

item.title: Nickel Aluminium Bronze Butterfly Valve DN150 PN16 Lug Type
item.description: Lug Type Butterfly Valve DN150 PN16/Class 150, Nickel Aluminium Bronze Body & Disc, EPDM Seat, Monel Stem, Manual Gearbox.

item.title: Nickel Aluminium Bronze Butterfly Valve DN100 PN16
item.description: Butterfly Valve DN100 PN16/Class 150, Nickel Aluminium Bronze Body & Disc, EPDM Seat, Monel Stem, Manual Gearbox.

item.title: Nickel Aluminium Bronze Butterfly Valve DN80 PN16 Lug Type
item.description: Lug Type Butterfly Valve DN80 PN16/Class 150, Nickel Aluminium Bronze Body & Disc, EPDM Seat, Monel Stem, Manual Gearbox, EN 10204 3.1 Certified.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Single Piece Screw End
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Single Piece Design with Screw End connections (BSP/BSPT/NPT). Compact design for steam, water, oil, air, and gas applications.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Single Piece Flange End
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Single Piece Design with Flange End Class 150. PTFE/GFT seats for reliable sealing in various applications.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Two Piece Flange End
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Two Piece Design with Flange End Class 150. Easy maintenance design with API 6D compliance.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Three Piece Screw End
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Three Piece Design with Screw/Socket Weld End. Full port design with easy in-line maintenance capability.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Three Piece Flange End Class 150
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Three Piece Design Flange End Class 150. Available with gear operation and actuator options.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Three Piece Flange End Class 300
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Three Piece Design Flange End Class 300. High pressure rating with gear and actuator operation available.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Three Piece E Table Flange
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Three Piece Design with E Table Flange connections. Compact design for space-constrained applications.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Three Piece F Table Flange
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve Three Piece Design with F Table Flange connections. Suitable for various industrial applications.

item.title: Cast Steel Ball Valve Three Piece Flange End
item.description: Cast Steel Ball Valve Three Piece Design with Flange End Class 150/300. WCB body with fire-safe and anti-static design available.

item.title: Needle Valve
item.description: Precision needle valves for accurate flow control. Available in round and square body designs with high pressure ratings up to 10,000 PSI.

item.title: I.C. Steam Trap Thermodynamic Type
item.description: Investment Cast Thermodynamic Steam Trap with AISI 410 body. Compact design for efficient condensate removal in steam systems.

item.title: C.I. Bucket & Ball Float Type Steam Trap
item.description: Cast Iron Bucket and Ball Float Type Steam Trap conforming to IS 12268 / ISO 6552. Reliable condensate removal with graphite gasket sealing.

item.title: Knife Edge Gate Valve Flanged
item.description: Knife Edge Gate Valve for powder and slurry applications. Available in WCB and Stainless Steel with sizes from 2" to 16".

item.title: C.I. Foot Valve Flange End 150#
item.description: Cast Iron Foot Valve with Flange End conforming to IS 4038/BS-1. Complete with strainer screen for water and oil applications.

item.title: C.I. Ball Valve Three Piece Flange End 150#
item.description: Cast Iron Ball Valve Three Piece Design with Flange End Class 150. Square body design up to 3", round body 4" and above. E/F table flanges available.

item.title: C.I. Ball Valve Two Piece Flange End 150#
item.description: Cast Iron Ball Valve Two Piece Design with Flange End Class 150. Locking lever available. Sizes 1" to 4" for water applications.

item.title: C.I./M.S./S.S. Ball Valve Single Piece Screw End
item.description: Single Piece Ball Valve available in Cast Iron, Mild Steel, or Stainless Steel. BSP/NPT threading. Compact design for water, oil, air, and gas.

item.title: Forged Steel Ball Valve Class 800/1500
item.description: Forged Steel Ball Valve Class 800 & 1500 with BSP/NPT/Socket Weld ends. High pressure rating up to 1100 PSI. ASTM A-105 & A-182 materials.

item.title: I.C. Three Way Ball Valve Screw End
item.description: Investment Cast Three Way Ball Valve with T-Port & L-Port designs. BSP/NPT threading. Sizes 1/2" to 2". Class 150 rating.

item.title: Three Way Ball Valve Flange End 150#
item.description: Three Way Ball Valve Flange End with T-Port & L-Port ball designs. Available in WCB, MS, and SS materials. Sizes 15mm to 150mm.

item.title: I.C. Flush Bottom Ball Valve Flange End
item.description: Investment Cast Flush Bottom Ball Valve with 45° or 90° lever operation. Class 150. Sizes 25x40mm to 80x100mm. For tank bottom applications.

item.title: Jacketed Ball Valve Flange End 150#
item.description: Jacketed Ball Valve with steam/thermal oil jacket for temperature control. Class 150. Sizes 25x40mm to 100x150mm. MS/SS 304/316 construction.

item.title: I.C. Ball Valve Tri-Clover (TC) End
item.description: Investment Cast Ball Valve with Tri-Clover (TC) sanitary connections. Class 150. Sizes 15mm to 50mm. For hygienic applications.

item.title: Butterfly Valve PN10
item.description: Butterfly Valve PN10 with rubber lining (Nitrile/EPDM/Viton/Silicon). Sizes 40mm to 300mm. API 609/IS 13095 compliant. Gear operated available.

item.title: Butterfly Valve PN16
item.description: Butterfly Valve PN16 with ISO 5211 mounting. Cast Iron/Cast Steel/SS construction. Sizes 40mm to 400mm. Gear operated available.

item.title: PTFE Lined Ball Valve Lever Operated
item.description: PTFE Lined Ball Valve with PFA/FEP lining. SG Iron/WCB/SS body. Sizes 1" to 4". For corrosive media applications.

item.title: PTFE Lined Butterfly Valve Lever Operated
item.description: PTFE Lined Butterfly Valve with FEP/PFA lining. API 609 compliant. Sizes 50mm to 350mm. For corrosive and aggressive media.

item.title: Gate Valve Flange End 150#
item.description: Gate Valve Flange End Class 150. ANSI B16.34/API 600 compliant. CF8/CF8M/CI/CS materials. Sizes 25mm to 300mm.

item.title: Globe Valve Flange End 150#
item.description: Globe Valve Flange End Class 150. BS 5351/API 6D compliant. CF8/CF8M/CI/CS materials. Sizes 25mm to 300mm.

item.title: I.C. Gate Valve Screw End
item.description: Investment Cast Gate Valve with BSP/NPT threading. Class 150. Sizes 1/2" to 2". ASTM A351 CF8/CF8M materials.

item.title: I.C. Globe Valve Screw End
item.description: Investment Cast Globe Valve with BSP/NPT threading. Class 150. Sizes 1/2" to 2". For throttling and flow control.

item.title: Forged Steel Gate & Globe Valve Class 800/1500
item.description: Forged Steel Gate & Globe Valves Class 800/1500. ASTM A105/F11/F22/F304/F316. High pressure up to 5400 PSIG. Sizes 1/2" to 2".

item.title: I.C. Disc Check Valve (DCV) Non Return Valve
item.description: Investment Cast Disc Check Valve (DCV) PN16/PN40. ASTM A351 CF8/CF8M. Sizes 15mm to 200mm. Spring loaded disc design.

item.title: I.C. Wafer Check Valve (NRV)
item.description: Investment Cast Wafer Check Valve PN10. API 6D/ANSI B16.34 compliant. IC CF8/CF8M. Sizes 40mm to 300mm.

item.description: Wafer Check Valve Barstock PN10/PN16. CI/MS/SS construction. Sizes 40mm to 300mm. Nitrile/EPDM O-ring.

item.description: Swing Check Valve Class 150. BS 1873/API 598 compliant. ASTM A216 WCB. Sizes 25mm to 300mm. Full port design.

item.description: Dual Plate Check Valve API 594/API 6D. Wafer type between flanges. Sizes 50mm to 600mm. Spring loaded dual disc design.

item.title: I.C. Y Strainer Screw End
item.description: Investment Cast Y Strainer with BSP threading. Class 150. Sizes 1/2" to 2". ASTM A351 CF8/CF8M. SS screen.

item.description: Cast Iron Y Strainer Flange End Class 150. Body test 7 Kg/cm². Sizes 25mm to 300mm. SS 202/304 screen.

item.description: Basket/Bucket Type Strainer Class 150/300. WCB/SS 304/316 construction. Sizes 50mm to 300mm. Large filtration area.

item.description: Investment Cast Double Window Sight Glass Class 150. ASTM A351 CF8/CF8M. Sizes 25mm to 100mm. Dual viewing windows.

item.description: Full View Sight Glass Barstock PN10/PN16. CI/MS/SS construction. Sizes 40mm to 200mm. Tempered glass.

item.description: Gauge Glass Cock Set for level indication. Sizes 1/2" to 1". MS/SS construction. For boiler and tank level monitoring.

item.description: Polypropylene Ball Valve Flange End PN10. Sizes 20mm to 110mm. Corrosion resistant. For chemical and water applications.

item.description: Polypropylene Non Return Valve Flange End PN10. Sizes 25mm to 100mm. Spring loaded disc design.

item.description: Stainless Steel Check Valve Flange End Class 150. ASTM A351 CF8/CF8M. Sizes 25mm to 300mm. Swing type.

item.description: Diaphragm Valve Weir Type. CI/SS body with EPDM/PTFE diaphragm. Sizes 15mm to 100mm. For corrosive media.

item.description: Diaphragm Valve Straight Through Type. CI/SS body. Sizes 15mm to 100mm. Full bore design.

item.description: Plug Valve Lubricated Type Class 150/300. WCB/SS construction. Sizes 25mm to 300mm. For on-off service.

item.description: Pinch Valve Sleeve Type. Natural rubber/EPDM sleeve. Sizes 25mm to 300mm. For slurry and abrasive media.

item.description: Control Valve with Pneumatic Actuator. Globe/Angle/Butterfly types. Sizes 15mm to 300mm. For process control.

item.description: Control Valve with Electric Actuator. Globe/Angle/Butterfly types. Sizes 15mm to 300mm. For automated control.

item.description: Pressure Seal Gate Valve Class 600/900/1500. ASTM A216 WCB. Sizes 50mm to 600mm. High pressure design.

item.description: Pressure Seal Globe Valve Class 600/900/1500. ASTM A216 WCB. Sizes 50mm to 600mm. High pressure throttling.

item.description: Cryogenic Ball Valve for LNG/LPG. Extended stem design. Sizes 15mm to 300mm. Temperature -196°C to +80°C.

item.description: Fire Safe Ball Valve API 607 certified. WCB/SS construction. Sizes 15mm to 300mm. For fire protection.

item.description: Trunnion Mounted Ball Valve Class 150-2500. API 6D compliant. Sizes 50mm to 600mm. For high pressure.

item.title: 30" Full Bore Through Conduit Slab Gate Valve CL300
item.description: 30 Inch Full Bore Through Conduit Slab Gate Valve, Class 300. WCB Body, ASME B16.47A flanges. Designed as per API 6D for oil and gas pipelines.

item.description: 30 Inch Full Bore Trunnion Mounted Ball Valve, Class 300. WCB Body, ASME B16.47A flanges. Designed as per API 6D for oil and gas service.

item.title: 30" Sandwich Valve CL300
item.description: 30 Inch Sandwich Valve, Class 300. WCB Body, ASME B16.47A flanges. Specialized valve for pipeline intervention and maintenance.

item.description: 40 Inch Full Bore Through Conduit Slab Gate Valve, Class 300. WCB Body, ASME B16.47A flanges. Designed as per API 6D for large diameter pipelines.

item.description: 40 Inch Full Bore Trunnion Mounted Ball Valve, Class 300. WCB Body, ASME B16.47A flanges. High capacity valve for large scale infrastructure.

item.description: 40 Inch Sandwich Valve, Class 300. WCB Body, ASME B16.47A flanges. Specialized heavy-duty valve for major pipeline operations.
